definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary

sentences.english: How was I supposed to know that the one twin would break it with his head?
sentences.chinese: 我怎能料到双胞胎中的一个会用头把他弄碎呢？

sentences.english: Chop peanuts, or crush them with the side of a knife, or pulse them in a food processor to chop roughly.
sentences.chinese: 碎掉的花生或是用刀柄将他们押碎，大致弄碎就是了。

sentences.english: She takes time was not careful pulverizes .
sentences.chinese: 她拿出来的时候不小心弄碎了。

sentences.english: The cook crumbled the bread and added it to the soup.
sentences.chinese: 厨师将面包弄碎，然后加入汤里。

sentences.english: You can use your fingers to crumble the herbs into small pieces or use a mortar and pestle.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用手指将药草弄碎成小块或是用研钵和杵。

sentences.english: Last week we had all our windows broken by the naughty boys.
sentences.chinese: 上星期我们所有的窗户都被淘气的孩子给弄碎了。

sentences.english: She crumbled up the bread and fed the bird.
sentences.chinese: 她把面包弄碎，喂给鸟吃。

sentences.english: Can you break up this pill for me?
sentences.chinese: 你能不能帮我把这颗药丸弄碎？

sentences.english: Break up the sausage and brown.
Gather small autumn leaves or larger ones that can be broken or cut up.
sentences.chinese: 收集一些可以弄碎的树叶，大小都可以。
那厨子弄碎了那些花生米。

sentences.english: Eventually I cracked under the pressures of peace and good will towards man.
sentences.chinese: 最后我在和平和对于男人的赞词的压力之下弄碎。

sentences.english: She crumb the bread before feeding it to the birds.
sentences.chinese: 她把面包弄碎，然后喂给鸟吃。

definition: to shatter/to smash/to break into pieces
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
to pull apart/to pry open with the hands
to cut up (into pieces)/to slice/to carve/to dice/to shred
